scripts.build-zip: rm -r public/source_files && mkdir public/source_files && mkdir public/source_files/minidapp && cp -r public public/source_files && cp .gitignore public/source_files && cp windows_zipper.js public/source_files && rm -r public/source_files/public/source_files && cp -r src public/source_files && cp package.json public/source_files && cp package-lock.json public/source_files && cp tsconfig.json public/source_files && cp README.md public/source_files && npm run build && rm minidapp/wallet-* && cd build && zip -r wallet-$npm_package_version.mds.zip . && mv wallet-$npm_package_version.mds.zip ../minidapp/
scripts.build-zip-w: rmdir public\source_files && md public\source_files && xcopy public public\source_files && copy .gitignore public\source_files copy windows_zipper.js public\source_files && rmdir public\source_files\public\source_files && xcopy src public\source_files && copy package.json public\source_files && copy package-lock.json public\source_files && copy tsconfig.json public\source_files && copy README.md public\source_files && npm run build
